00020 
00021 #ifndef __TBB_enumerable_thread_specific_H
00022 #define __TBB_enumerable_thread_specific_H
00023 
00024 #include "tbb/concurrent_vector.h"
00025 #include "tbb/cache_aligned_allocator.h"
00026 
00027 #if _WIN32||_WIN64
00028 #include <windows.h>
00029 #else
00030 #include <pthread.h>
00031 #endif
00032 
00033 namespace tbb {
00034 
00036 template <typename T, typename Allocator=cache_aligned_allocator<T> > 
00037 class enumerable_thread_specific { 
00038 
00039 #if _WIN32||_WIN64
00040     typedef DWORD tls_key_t;
00041     static inline void create_key( tls_key_t &k) { k = TlsAlloc(); }
00042     static inline void destroy_key( tls_key_t &k) { TlsFree(k); }
00043     static inline void set_tls( tls_key_t &k, T * value) { TlsSetValue(k, (LPVOID)value); }
00044     static inline T * get_tls( tls_key_t &k ) { return (T *)TlsGetValue(k); }
00045 #else
00046     typedef pthread_key_t tls_key_t;
00047     static inline void create_key( tls_key_t &k) { pthread_key_create(&k, NULL); }
00048     static inline void destroy_key( tls_key_t &k) { pthread_key_delete(k); }
00049     static inline void set_tls( tls_key_t &k, T * value) { pthread_setspecific(k, (void *)value); }
00050     static inline T * get_tls( tls_key_t &k ) { return (T *) pthread_getspecific(k); }
00051 #endif
00052 
00053     tls_key_t my_key;
00054     T my_exemplar;
00055 
00056     typedef tbb::concurrent_vector< T, Allocator > internal_collection_type;
00057     internal_collection_type my_locals;
00058 
00059 public:
00060 
00062     typedef Allocator allocator_type;
00063     typedef T value_type;
00064     typedef T& reference;
00065     typedef T* pointer;
00066     typedef typename internal_collection_type::size_type size_type;
00067     typedef typename internal_collection_type::difference_type difference_type;
00068 
00069     // Parallel range types
00070     typedef typename internal_collection_type::range_type range_type;
00071     typedef typename internal_collection_type::const_range_type const_range_type;
00072 
00073     // Iterator types
00074     typedef typename internal_collection_type::iterator iterator;
00075     typedef typename internal_collection_type::const_iterator const_iterator;
00076 
00078     enumerable_thread_specific() { 
00079         create_key(my_key); 
00080     }
00081 
00083     enumerable_thread_specific(const T &_exemplar) : my_exemplar(_exemplar) {
00084         create_key(my_key); 
00085     }
00086 
00088    ~enumerable_thread_specific() { 
00089         destroy_key(my_key); 
00090    }
00091 
00093     reference local()  {
00094         if ( pointer local_ptr = get_tls(my_key) ) {
00095            return *local_ptr;
00096         } else {
00097             typename internal_collection_type::size_type local_index = my_locals.push_back(my_exemplar);
00098             reference local_ref = my_locals[local_index];
00099             set_tls( my_key, &local_ref );
00100             return local_ref;
00101         }
00102     }
00103 
00105     size_type size() const { return my_locals.size(); }
00106 
00108     bool empty() const { return my_locals.empty(); }
00109 
00111     range_type range( size_t grainsize=1 ) { return my_locals.range(grainsize); }
00112     
00114     const_range_type range( size_t grainsize=1 ) const { return my_locals.range(grainsize); }
00115 
00117     iterator begin() { return my_locals.begin(); }
00119     iterator end() { return my_locals.end(); }
00121     const_iterator begin() const { return my_locals.begin(); }
00123     const_iterator end() const { return my_locals.end(); }
00124 
00126     void clear() {
00127         my_locals.clear();
00128         destroy_key(my_key);
00129         create_key(my_key); 
00130     }
00131 
00132 };
00133 
00134 }
00135 
00136 #endif
